dct_description_sm: This point shapefile represents all 5-star hotels in Abu Dhabi as of fall 2018. The data contains information about the number of reviews in Booking.com, Google, TripAdvisor as well as the average Booking.com, Google, Trip Advisor ratings. Other data attributes include the number of rooms, number of floors, year opened, cheapest price per room, cheapest booking platform, number of swimming pools, number of bars, number of restaurants, number of nightclubs, and beach access. This data was collected as part of a student project for the NYU Abu Dhabi course Data and Human Space taught by David Wrisley during fall semester 2018.
dct_title_s: Five Star Hotels in Abu Dhabi, 2018
